items.sentence: Tom is probably going to go to Boston tomorrow.
At that time, I didn\'t know what Tom had done.
The pretty girl in the bikini is Tom\'s sister.
Have you ever decorated your house for a party?
Have you ever thought about becoming a teacher?
We promise you that we\'ll never be late again.
I wouldn\'t allow Tom to do that if I were you.
I\'d be grateful to you if you did that for me.
I\'d like to buy the house that Tom is selling.
Please keep on working even when I\'m not here.
